post.title: 2011 New Year’s Resolution
post.author: abelgaxiola
post.excerpt: This year I have resolved to work on improving three things fundamental to my wellbeing: my body, my mind, and my soul. Here is what I will do during 2011.
post.content:
This year I have resolved to work on improving three things fundamental to my wellbeing: my body, my mind, and my soul. Here is what I will do during 2011.

My mind: I will learn something new related to my professional life. I’ve been wanting to learn ASP.NET MVC and Silverlight for the longest and I will not wait any longer.

My body: I will stop slacking off and implement an exercise routine that includes training for the bike ride at Kino and continue my workout routine after the month of May; in other words: I will not shelf the bike after the tour.

My soul: I promise to spend more time giving of myself to others and follow the golden rule to the best of my ability – “…all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you, do ye even so to them…”

Those three things are my new year’s resolution for this 2011. So it is written, so it shall be done…
